name: Mariner Accident (itch)
description:
• Horizontal survival shooter game in SCI-FI settings
  • You are free to use five kinds of weapon: pistol, shotgun, machine gun, flamethrower and grenades
  • Kill enemies and collect loot
  • Take perks and level-up your weapons 
  • Take perks and influence your health, position, time speed etc.
  • Global leaderboard
